Plot: A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return as no longer human. Can two college dropouts save humankind from this silent, otherworldly invasion?
Title: John Dies at the End
Writer: Don Coscarelli (written for the screen by), David Wong (based on the story by)
Actors: Chase Williamson, Rob Mayes, Paul Giamatti, Clancy Brown
tomatoConsensus: Some will find the darkly funny, genre-bending incoherence of John Dies at the End charming; some will feel its zany antics and gore lead to an unsatisfying payoff.
